resources.string: The name of this Padang food comes from its place of origin. Sate Padang is a typical satay from Padang. Made from roasted beef doused with a sauce similar to curry sauce.
It is made from dried beef. The food invented by the Minangkabau people has become a popular dish in the archipelago. Jerky balado and beef jerky are actually the same.
Soto is a soupy culinary dish that can be found in almost every corner of the archipelago. One of the variants of soto that is quite favorite among the people is soto padang.
Balado fish is fish cooked with balado seasoning containing chilies, tomatoes, limes, shallots, salt, sugar, and water. The taste is spicy and sweet, very suitable for most Indonesian tongues.
This West Lombok special food is already quite famous. Made from vegetables such as kale, lombok, which is larger in size and texture than outer kale.

This culinary is very famous even outside Lombok. One portion of whole chicken covered with Lombok\'s special spices for Taliwang chicken then cooked by grilling or frying, perfect served with a plate of warm rice and Lombok\'s special chili sauce.
Sate bulayak is a culinary dish typical of Lombok which contains satay and bulayak. Bulayak is a kind of diamond but the shape is elliptical and the wrapper is made from palm leaves.

Nasi Campur is a typical Lombok food on Gili Trawangan that you can try if you stay around the Gilis. In the author\'s experience, Nasi Campur is the cheapest food sold on the Gilis, especially Gili Trawangan.
Pempek is a traditional food made from fish and sago. The type of fish used is mackerel. Fish mixed with sago is printed and then boiled.
One serving of tekwan contains fish balls, white noodles, and clear gravy with a distinctive taste. The gravy is made from the broth of prawn heads and leeks so it is very savory and delicious.
This one food is made from a mixture of sago flour and rice flour and then cooked like a thin omelette. The omelette is then rolled up and sliced ​​rather large so that it looks like kwetiau.

Mie celor is a carbohydrate source dish that can replace rice or tubers. The carbohydrate content comes from the use of egg noodles, coconut milk, and starch. The protein content in celor noodles comes from shrimp, shredded chicken, and boiled eggs.
Mie Aceh is one of the original Acehnese specialties which is made from the main ingredient of wheat flour and cooked using a spicy red sauce typical of Aceh.
Aceh\'s typical Gurih rice has a recipe that resembles uduk rice. It is often served with side dishes such as lado fish, omelette, or fried fish.

The ingredients for making Chicken Capture are fried chicken pieces that are stir-fried with teumura leaves and green chilies, and sprinkled with fried onions. Various restaurants in Aceh that sell this menu
This dish has a brownish color with a slight green accent. The ingredients for making Sambal Asam Udeung include wuluh starfruit, as well as a mixture of spices and kali shrimp.
